heroTitle: Premium Cleaning for Busy New Yorkers
heroDescription: From effortless online booking to personalized cleaner profiles, Cleanuity pairs every home with carefully vetted professionals and offers the option to rebook your favorite cleaner with just one click.
featuresDescription: We combine thoughtful technology with white-glove execution to take the guesswork out of home cleaning.

features.title: Auto-Rebook
features.description: Schedule recurring cleanings with your favorite cleaner and confirm with just one click, similar to Amazon Subscribe & Save.

features.title: Cleaner Profiles
features.description: Browse detailed cleaner profiles with stats, ratings, and specialties to find the perfect match for your home.

features.title: Real-Time Tracking
features.description: Track your cleaner's arrival with Uber Eats-style ETA updates, so you're never left wondering when they'll arrive.

features.title: Photo Verification
features.description: Receive photo verification of completed cleans, perfect for remote homeowners or Airbnb hosts.

features.title: Smart Home Integration
features.description: Seamlessly integrate with Amazon Key, SmartThings, and other keyless entry systems for secure access.

features.title: Trusted Professionals
features.description: All cleaners undergo rigorous background checks and training to ensure the highest quality service.

howItWorksDescription: Booking a cleaning with Cleanuity is simple and hassle-free.

steps.title: Book Online
steps.description: Select your preferred date, time, and cleaning options through our easy-to-use booking system.

steps.title: Choose Your Cleaner
steps.description: Browse cleaner profiles and select the professional that best matches your needs.

steps.title: Track Arrival
steps.description: Receive real-time updates as your cleaner approaches your home.

steps.title: Enjoy a Clean Home
steps.description: Your cleaner will thoroughly clean your home according to your specifications.

steps.title: Verify Results
steps.description: Receive photo verification of the completed cleaning for your peace of mind.

steps.title: One-Click Rebook
steps.description: Easily schedule your next cleaning with your favorite cleaner in just one click.
